data.enText: to make a judgement about the nature or quality of sb/sth

data.chText: 这些变化带来的效果难以评估。
data.enText: It's difficult to assess the effects of these changes.

data.chText: 这些年轻人被评定为谨慎驾驶员和不谨慎驾驶员两类。
data.enText: The young men were assessed as either safe or unsafe drivers.
I'd assess your chances as low.

data.chText: 由该委员会评定建筑物是否值得保存。
data.enText: The committee assesses whether a building is worth preserving.

data.chText: 我们正设法评估这个系统运行得是否顺畅。
data.enText: We are trying to assess how well the system works.

data.chText: 估算，估定，核定（数量、价值）
data.enText: to calculate the amount or value of sth
They have assessed the amount of compensation to be paid.

data.chText: 该建筑物的损失估定为4万英镑。
data.enText: Damage to the building was assessed at £40 000.

ex.chText: 他们决定给这幅画估一估价。
ex.enText: They decided to get the painting valued.

ex.chText: 两个价值超过10万英镑的花瓶从展会上被盗走了。
ex.enText: Two vases valued at over 100,000 were stolen from the exhibition.

synonyms.bx: 指通过与相似之物进行比较而决定某物值多少钱，通常用被动语态。

ex.chText: 他们的公寓估价为30万美元。
ex.enText: The value of their apartment was assessed at $300,000.

ex.chText: 他们花了一周的时间核定赔偿额。
ex.enText: It took them one week to assess the amount of compensation to be paid.

synonyms.bx: 指计算出某事物的价值、数额、质量、重要性等。

ex.chText: 这把椅子估计花了他300元。
ex.enText: This chair is estimated to have cost him 300 yuan.

ex.chText: 组织者估计参加的人有1万。

synonyms.bx: 指估算出某事物的价值、规模、速度等。

tr: evaluate or estimate the nature, quality, ability, extent, or significance of
example: I will have the family jewels appraised by a professional
access all the factors when taking a risk

tr: estimate the value of (property) for taxation
example: Our house hasn't been assessed in years

tr: set or determine the amount of (a payment such as a fine)
charge (a person or a property) with a payment, such as a tax or a fine

value.def: When you assess a person, thing, or situation, you consider them in order to make a judgment about them.

example.ex: Our correspondent has been assessing the impact of the sanctions...
example.tran: 我们的记者一直在评估制裁带来的影响。

example.ex: The test was to assess aptitude rather than academic achievement...
example.tran: 这次测试是考查能力，而不是学习成绩。

example.ex: It would be a matter of assessing whether she was well enough to travel.
example.tran: 问题是要看她是否已康复到可以旅行。

value.def: When you assess the amount of money that something is worth or should be paid, you calculate or estimate it.

example.ex: Ask them to send you information on how to assess the value of your belongings...
example.tran: 让他们把怎样评估你的财产价值的资料寄来。
这些财产的估值是多少？
